mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.proc_ins_id AS "procInsId", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.purchase_no AS "purchaseNo", a.line_no2 AS "lineNo2", a.invoice_no AS "invoiceNo", a.invoice_date AS "invoiceDate", a.new_remarks AS "newRemarks"
LEFT JOIN pm_purchase_ord b ON b.purchase_no = a.purchase_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pm_pur_invoice( id, proc_ins_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, purchase_no, line_no2, invoice_no, invoice_date, new_remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{procInsId}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{purchaseNo}, #{lineNo2}, #{invoiceNo}, #{invoiceDate}, #{newRemarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE pm_pur_invoice SET proc_ins_id = #{procInsId}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, purchase_no = #{purchaseNo}, line_no2 = #{lineNo2}, invoice_no = #{invoiceNo}, invoice_date = #{invoiceDate}, new_remarks = #{newRemarks} WHERE id = #{id}
